review: Purchased the Firestick to replace a Roku stick that couldn't keep a steady SlingTV stream. It's an older, wall-mounted LCD that appeared to interfere with the Roku's wireless reception. Firestick works flawlessly!

review: This was a very good purchase for me.  It performs better than I expected and it was easy to install and to use first time out.  No digitized pixels and so easy for an older person.
